category-def.name: Shadow Plug-in for Eclipse
category-def.label: Shadow Plug-in for Eclipse
category-def.description: This plug-in provides syntax highlighting, brace matching, and code folding support for Shadow source files in the Eclipse IDE. If a Shadow compiler is available in the form of a shadow.jar file, the plug-in can also outline code, report errors and warnings in the source code, and compile and launch programs.
